live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37841.summary: Some customers in Lower Townsite Surroundings of Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37841.title: May 29 – Fort McMurray (Lower Townsite Surroundings) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
